The food here was innovative and delicious.  The service was a little stand-offish, but generally nice.  The pasta and fish dishes we had here were really good.  The salad was also quite tasty and something we might try to recreate at home.  Like many of our other favorite restaurants in Barcelona, this wasn't necessarily "spanish" food, it was just wordly delicious food.  You can make reservations online.  Definitely do that!
